description: Priyantha Amal Sudusinghe Vs. Koswatta Liyange Ariyawnsha and Others before Hon. Damith Thotawatte, J.
parties: Priyantha Amal Sudusinghe Vs. Koswatta Liyange Ariyawnsha and Others
